Original: 走進這家酒吧，瞬間被英國高級招待所的氣氛所吸引。店內佈置有英倫風格的皮革沙發、閃耀的水晶吊燈和精選石材，每一細節都流露出優雅與品味。店員極具專業，能夠清楚地介紹每一款威士忌的特色。尤其值得一提的是兩家以品質聞名的小產量威士忌品牌，艾德多爾和百樂門，以及兩家頂尖的獨立裝瓶廠，Gordon & Macphail 和 Signatory。這裡不僅酒價合理，酒質頂尖，員工專業，且環境舒適，給予五星評價都顯得不夠。在這裡，您不僅享受到頂級的威士忌品鑑，更是一場視覺和味覺的雙重盛宴。店內提供顧客最佳的品酒體驗。無論是新手還是老行家，這裡都是品嚐和探索威士忌的絕佳之地。
EN: Entering this bar, it was instantly attracted by the atmosphere of the British High Welfare Institute.The British -style leather sofa, shining crystal chandeliers and selected stones are arranged in the store. Each detail shows elegance and taste.The clerk is very professional and can clearly introduce the characteristics of each whiskey.In particular, it is worth mentioning that two small -quality small output whiskey brands, Eddor and Belomon, and two top independent bottle factories, Gordon & MacPhail and Signatic.Not only is the price reasonable, the top wine is top, the employee is professional, and the environment is comfortable, it seems not enough to give five -star evaluation.Here, you not only enjoy the top -level whiskey tasting, but also a dual feast of visual and taste.The store provides the best wine tasting experience for customers.Whether it is novices or veterans, this is an excellent place for tasting and exploring whiskey.
